divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside with some friends and we was looking at the moon. Around the moon it was a circle. It was really beutyful. And then for just 5 sekonds it came a bright red orange cigar shaped "thing". Around the "thing"it was starblue coulored. it came from nowhere and in extremly high speed it was turning away again. I saw the "thing" in 5 sek.I don���t now if it was small or big, beacuse I can���t say if it was close or far away. It was standing up like a trafic light. The feeling was really god and it was beutyful. I wish that it has stayed for a longer time.
Summary: Extremly fast cigar shaped red orange coulored
